additions.new_text:
dom_process_parse_chunk(
				ctx,
				document,
				parser,
				buf_ref - last_output - skip,
				last_output,
				buf_ref - last_output,
				tokenizer_error_offset,
				tree_error_offset
			)

dom_process_parse_chunk(
				ctx,
				document,
				parser,
				LXB_ENCODING_REPLACEMENT_SIZE,
				LXB_ENCODING_REPLACEMENT_BYTES,
				0,
				tokenizer_error_offset,
				tree_error_offset
			)

			ctx,

			parser,
			buf_ref - last_output,
			last_output,

				decoding_encoding_ctx->encoding_output,

dom_decode_encode_fast_path(
